name: Slow Cooker Pot Roast
author: keylimeone
summary: It's quick and easy to assemble.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (1.2 ounce) package dry beef gravy mix
1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
½ cup water, or as needed
directions: Spray the inside of a slow cooker with cooking spray
Spread the onion slices out into the bottom of the cooker
Spread the flour out onto a work surface
Sprinkle the chuck roast with salt and black pepper, and roll the roast in the flour to coat all sides
Using the edge of a small, sturdy plate, pound the flour into the meat
Place the floured roast into the cooker on top of the onions
Whisk together beef gravy mix, ranch dressing mix, and Italian dressing mix in a bowl, and whisk the mixes with water until smooth
Cover the cooker, set to Low, and cook until the roast is tender and the gravy has thickened, about 8 hours
